alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:26PM CST until December 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO 12 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation of rain, freezing rain, and snow expected. Total ice accumulations up to around one tenth of an inch and snow accumulations less than one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 9 PM Wednesday to 12 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
